text: Only 4 stars because I've never eaten in their resto only had it delivered.  SO good. The paneer masala dosa and the garlic butter dosa are so yummy. How yummy?? Garlicky....buttery.....crispy  ...is your mouth watering yet? Their mango lassi is the perfect match to wash it down with.   If you haven't tried this place yet....do yourself a favour and go!
Great for simple and tasty meals. Authentic and affordable. Good dosas and chutney, and pav bhaji.
All the chaats are so so good specially the chatpat doona super super good and tasty . Cant get over the taste of it . Super mouth watering chatpaati chaats gives the feel of indian street chats
